prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, but without Strings.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Synth Lead, and Piano, but no Strings.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Bass, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Synth Lead, and Piano, omitting Strings.

Style 3:
This composition includes Bass, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Synth Lead, and Piano, Strings excluded.
